effect_bundles.localised_description: Your have begun your ascent to greatness, but there is much yet to do.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your power is both feared and coveted.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Your power is both feared and coveted.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Where the mystery is deepest lies the gate of all that is subtle and wonderful.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Where the mystery is deepest lies the gate of all that is subtle and wonderful.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Even when the Great Way ceases to be observed, we still have benevolence and righteousness.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Even when the Great Way ceases to be observed, we still have benevolence and righteousness.

localised_description.last_approved_text: By attaining the height of abstraction we gain fullness of rest.

effect_bundles.localised_description: By attaining the height of abstraction we gain fullness of rest.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Heaven diminishes where there is superabundance and supplements where there is deficiency.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Heaven diminishes where there is superabundance and supplements where there is deficiency.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The sage sees simplicity even in complexity, so never has any difficulties.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The sage sees simplicity even in complexity, so never has any difficulties.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The ruling sage acts without claiming the results to be his own; he achieves merit and does not rest arrogantly, as he does not wish to display his superiority.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The ruling sage acts without claiming the results to be his own; he achieves merit and does not rest arrogantly, as he does not wish to display his superiority.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Traverses the world as normal. Yellow Turban forces raid and cause unrest by their sheer presence.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Traverses the world as normal. Yellow Turban forces raid and cause unrest by their sheer presence.

This army is building its strength.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your brethren have taken control of Luoyang! This incredible achievement will surely rally many people to your cause. Truly the Han have lost the Mandate!

effect_bundles.localised_description: Your brethren have taken control of Luoyang! This incredible achievement will surely rally many people to your cause. Truly the Han have lost the Mandate!

localised_title.last_approved_text: Yellow Turbans March Into the Capital

effect_bundles.localised_title: Yellow Turbans March Into the Capital

localised_description.last_approved_text: All people are settled on the land and the people are at ease.

effect_bundles.localised_description: All people are settled on the land and the people are at ease.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A relatively small amount of people have been displaced. In time, they will seek new homes, and calm will return to the land.

effect_bundles.localised_description: A relatively small amount of people have been displaced. In time, they will seek new homes, and calm will return to the land.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your administration works tirelessly to ensure that the displaced peasantry do not cause problems. Some vagrants are still present, but no more than expected with the ongoing wars beyond your borders.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Your administration works tirelessly to ensure that the displaced peasantry do not cause problems. Some vagrants are still present, but no more than expected with the ongoing wars beyond your borders.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Whilst there are many people that have had to flee from war, the situation is still manageable.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Whilst there are many people that have had to flee from war, the situation is still manageable.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Many peasants flee war and seek refuge in our lands. Our people demand we do something before the situation worsens and the homeless outnumber the settled.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Many peasants flee war and seek refuge in our lands. Our people demand we do something before the situation worsens and the homeless outnumber the settled.

localised_description.last_approved_text: War has ravaged China. Vast swarms of peasants roam the streets, unable to find permanent residence. Divisions grow between your people and the vagrants, and unrest has greatly fallen. However, there is plenty of available labour should you require it.

effect_bundles.localised_description: War has ravaged China. Vast swarms of peasants roam the streets, unable to find permanent residence. Divisions grow between your people and the vagrants, and unrest has greatly fallen. However, there is plenty of available labour should you require it.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Steadfast and dependable, you are known as a capable warrior and general.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Throughout China your name is known on the lips of every traitor and evildoer, and it makes them tremble.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your are an undeniable force that no enemy can resist.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Despite your noble reputation, the accusations against you have stripped you of all authority; it is time to take matters in hand.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Authority does not come easily; you have done well to grow beyond your humble desires and establish yourself as a respectable power.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A contract broken carries with it the final curses of those that died on the battlefield, waiting for relief that never came…

localised_description.last_approved_text: There are those who doubt you are worth your coin – tread carefully, lest you find yourself out of work.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Experience and knowledge are like torches in the night. By placing them together a great bonfire can be made, yielding great wisdom for us all.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your domain holds few beauties and riches. Those who pass through it leave unimpressed, and those who do not come will never hear of it.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Your domain holds few beauties and riches. Those who pass through it leave unimpressed, and those who do not come will never hear of it.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your domain is impressive to behold. It is a veritable hub of trade, culture and study. Those who inhabit it observe with reverence, and your land draws in immigrants and passersby in droves.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Your domain is impressive to behold. It is a veritable hub of trade, culture and study. Those who inhabit it observe with reverence, and your land draws in immigrants and passersby in droves.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your domain is of legendary beauty and affluence. Those who pass through it rarely leave, and your legend will echo through the ages.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Your domain is of legendary beauty and affluence. Those who pass through it rarely leave, and your legend will echo through the ages.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Time can mend trauma of the mind but it takes the art of a healer to mend a broken body.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Time can mend trauma of the mind but it takes the art of a healer to mend a broken body.

localised_description.last_approved_text: To accumulate, one has to speculate, and very little here has been ventured!

effect_bundles.localised_description: To accumulate, one has to speculate, and very little here has been ventured!

localised_description.last_approved_text: What is nurtured may grow, and indeed your investments now begin to take flight!

effect_bundles.localised_description: What is nurtured may grow, and indeed your investments now begin to take flight!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Investment, wisely placed, brings exponential returns!

effect_bundles.localised_description: Investment, wisely placed, brings exponential returns!

localised_description.last_approved_text: What money cannot buy is not worth owning.

effect_bundles.localised_description: What money cannot buy is not worth owning.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Wealth is power.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Wealth is power.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This army enjoys the benefits of abundant military supplies.

effect_bundles.localised_description: This army enjoys the benefits of abundant military supplies.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A lack of military supplies will lead to forces suffering from attrition.

effect_bundles.localised_description: A lack of military supplies will lead to forces suffering from attrition.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Military supplies are low.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Military supplies are low.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This army has normal supply levels.

effect_bundles.localised_description: This army has normal supply levels.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The lay of the land is well known and those fighting to protect it know what is at stake.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The lay of the land is well known and those fighting to protect it know what is at stake.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The lay of the land is well known and those fighting to protect it know what is at stake.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The lay of the land is well known and those fighting to protect it know what is at stake.

localised_description.last_approved_text: One should see nothing improper, hear nothing improper, say nothing improper, do nothing improper.

effect_bundles.localised_description: One should see nothing improper, hear nothing improper, say nothing improper, do nothing improper.

localised_description.last_approved_text: What you present to your generals and advisors is the same as presented to the enemy: a trustworthy and predicable leader.

effect_bundles.localised_description: What you present to your generals and advisors is the same as presented to the enemy, a trustworthy and predicable leader.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You are reputed for your honesty and conviction; your counsel is heard and strongly considered.

effect_bundles.localised_description: You are reputed for your honesty and conviction; your counsel is heard and strongly considered.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your integrity is beyond reproach; throughout the realm you are respected by friend and foe alike.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Your integrity is beyond reproach; throughout the realm you are respected by friend and foe alike.

localised_description.last_approved_text: To govern others one must first learn to govern oneself.

effect_bundles.localised_description: To govern others one must first learn to govern oneself.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Yours is a heart of virtue and collected calm; your qualities as a leader inspire and motivate your people.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Yours is a heart of virtue and collected calm; your qualities as a leader inspire and motivate your people.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your reputation walks before you – there is no man, woman or child in China who has not heard of your fury and your talents.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Your reputation walks before you – there is no man, woman or child in China who has not heard of your fury and your talents.

localised_description.last_approved_text: When you roar, enemies tremble. Your strength is legendary, from the highest mountain the lowest valley.

effect_bundles.localised_description: When you roar, enemies tremble. Your strength is legendary, from the highest mountain the lowest valley.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You snap at the heels of your would-be oppressor, yet you are a nuisance – nothing more.

effect_bundles.localised_description: You snap at the heels of your would-be oppressor, yet you are a nuisance – nothing more.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have fought your way to recognition, but there is much more yet to do before they fear you.

effect_bundles.localised_description: You have fought your way to recognition, but there is much more yet to do before they fear you.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Worried whispers of your strength and might carry across China – it is your name that gives them pause!

effect_bundles.localised_description: Worried whispers of your strength and might carry across China – it is your name that gives them pause!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Talk of the Bandit Queen strikes fear into the hearts of nobles and peasants alike – they dread your coming storm!

effect_bundles.localised_description: Talk of the Bandit Queen strikes fear into the hearts of nobles and peasants alike – they dread your coming storm!

localised_description.last_approved_text: All of China knows your strength and your brilliance – you have risen from nothing to claim everything; you have become a legend!

effect_bundles.localised_description: All of China knows your strength and your brilliance – you have risen from nothing to claim everything; you have become a legend!

localised_description.last_approved_text: More bark than bite, your words are dismissed as empty threats.

effect_bundles.localised_description: More bark than bite, your words are dismissed as empty threats.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Word of your brutality and malice precedes you - lesser men are cowed by your might.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Word of your brutality and malice precedes you - lesser men are cowed by your might.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your wrath has seen corpse-strewn battlefields, and cities reduced to ash. Only fools would ignore your strength.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Your wrath has seen corpse-strewn battlefields, and cities reduced to ash. Only fools would ignore your strength.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Long have you been mocked, dismissed and ignored; will you languish in lowliness forever?

effect_bundles.localised_description: Long have you been mocked, dismissed and ignored; will you languish in lowliness forever?

localised_description.last_approved_text: Through determined effort, you have made yourself worthy of acknowledgement.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Through determined effort, you have made yourself worthy of acknowledgement.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You are finally given the respect you deserve – China knows of your efforts, and through fear or love, they approve.

effect_bundles.localised_description: You are finally given the respect you deserve – China knows of your efforts, and through fear or love, they approve.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There are few who now question your heavenly mandate; complete rule over China, and unlimited power, are finally within reach.

effect_bundles.localised_description: There are few who now question your heavenly mandate; complete rule over China, and unlimited power, are finally within reach.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You are descended from a distinguished, centuries-old family, but what have you contributed to its legacy?

effect_bundles.localised_description: You are descended from a distinguished, centuries-old family, but what have you contributed to its legacy?

localised_description.last_approved_text: Word of your name is spreading, for your actions have been noteworthy and your reputation is increasing.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Word is spreading of your name, your actions have been noteworthy and your notability is increasing.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your achievements have not gone unnoticed and you are on the path to fulfilling your family legacy.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Your achievements have not gone unnoticed and you are on the path to fulfilling your family legacy.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Through words and deeds, your reputation as the true successor of the Yuan has been established!

effect_bundles.localised_description: Through words and deeds, your reputation as the true successor of the Yuan has been established!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Long after your time is done, the scribes of future generations will still be celebrating your legacy.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Long after your time is done, the scribes of future generations will still be celebrating your legacy.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There is greater unity to be found, but you must strive for it!

effect_bundles.localised_description: There is greater unity to be found, but you must strive for it!

localised_description.last_approved_text: If earnest desire cannot unify your people, then a common goal and a common threat will.

effect_bundles.localised_description: If earnest desire cannot unify your people, then a common goal and a common threat will.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have found a driving force for yourself and your followers, who now find harmony in their beliefs and ideals.

effect_bundles.localised_description: You have found a driving force for yourself and your followers, who now find harmony in their beliefs and ideals.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You and your followers have found unity through ideals and peace through purpose.

effect_bundles.localised_description: You and your followers have found unity through ideals and peace through purpose.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Though your armies march with fearsome purpose, the weak begin to fear what you are capable of.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You are mighty indeed, but those who cannot comprehend your ambitions actively agitate against you.

effect_bundles.localised_description: You are mighty indeed, but those who cannot comprehend your ambitions actively agitate against you.

localised_description.last_approved_text: None can doubt the vastness of your achievements - even the quarrellers and quibblers that once plagued you have thrown themselves behind your mission.

effect_bundles.localised_description: None can doubt the vastness of your achievements - even the quarrellers and quibblers that once plagued you have thrown themselves behind your mission.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have yet to commit to this alignment.

effect_bundles.localised_description: You have yet to commit to this alignment.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have begun to walk the path of humility, duty and kindness.

effect_bundles.localised_description: You have begun to walk the path of humility, duty and kindness.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You are everybody's friend - perhaps goodness can win out after all?

effect_bundles.localised_description: You are everybody's friend - perhaps goodness can win out after all.

localised_description.last_approved_text: As your reputation for kindness grows, the realm flourishes - but so do those who seek to take advantage of your generosity.

effect_bundles.localised_description: As your reputation for kindness grows, the realm flourishes - but so do those who seek to take advantage of your generosity.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You are beloved throughout the realm, but your lenience has allowed vile leeches to flourish.

effect_bundles.localised_description: You are beloved throughout the realm, but your lenience has allowed vile leeches to flourish.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The unwavering example of virtue you have set has shamed those who seek to exploit the meek.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The unwavering example of virtue you have set has shamed those who seek to exploit the meek.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have yet to commit to this alignment.

effect_bundles.localised_description: You have yet to commit to this alignment.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have begun to walk the path of wealth.

effect_bundles.localised_description: You have begun to walk the path of wealth.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The wheels of your land are liberally greased with the application of wealth.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The wheels of your land are liberally greased with the application of wealth.

localised_description.last_approved_text: As prosperity increases, so do expectations. Seeing the wealth that flows through your coffers, your courtiers demand a greater share of the spoils.

effect_bundles.localised_description: As prosperity increases, so do expectations. Seeing the wealth that flows through your coffers, your courtiers demand a greater share of the spoils.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The more you feed your followers, the more they want. Your court is run through by untramelled greed.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The more you feed your followers, the more they want. Your court is run through by untramelled greed.

localised_description.last_approved_text: So magnificent are your achievements and so unending are your coffers that the demands for greater salaries ebb - the benefits of your rule are clear to all.

effect_bundles.localised_description: So magnificent are your achievements and so unending are your coffers that the demands for greater salaries ebb - the benefits of your rule are clear to all.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You allow the ambitions of others to supersede your own; were your subjects to demand that you jump, you would ask "How high?" Get a grip!

effect_bundles.localised_description: You allow the ambitions of others to supersede your own; were your subjects to demand that you jump, you would ask "How high?" Get a grip!

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have developed a reputation for accommodating the needs and ambitions of your subjects.

effect_bundles.localised_description: You have developed a reputation for accommodating the needs and ambitions of your subjects.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You tread the fine line between knowing when to trust in the abilities of others and when to take your own decisive action.

effect_bundles.localised_description: You tread the fine line between knowing when to trust in the abilities of others and when to take your own decisive action.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Some responsibility should be delegated, you suppose, but you'll be sure to see that your subjects are adhering to your grand designs.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Some responsibility should be delegated, you suppose, but you'll be sure to see that your subjects are adhering to your grand designs.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Managing a princedom is no small feat; it is clear that none can do it as well as you, nor are you likely to give them the opportunity to try.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Managing a Princedom is no small feat; it is clear that none can do it as well as you, nor are you likely to give them the opportunity to try.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Counties within your jurisdiction.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Counties within your jurisdiction.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The extent of your domain falls well within your jurisdiction; just rule yields great rewards!

effect_bundles.localised_description: The extent of your domain falls well within your jurisdiction; just rule yields great rewards!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The extent of your domain is appropriate to your lawful jurisdiction. All is well.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The extent of your domain is appropriate to your lawful jurisdiction. All is well.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your domain has extended beyond your lawful jurisdiction; your ability to govern is suffering slightly as a result.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Your domain has extended beyond your lawful jurisdiction; your ability to govern is suffering slightly as a result.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your jurisdiction is being pushed to its limits as your domain grows ever larger; it is becoming increasingly difficult to maintain order in government.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Your jurisdiction is being pushed to its limits as your domain grows ever larger; it is becoming increasingly difficult to maintain order in government.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your domain is far greater than your jurisdiction allows you to reasonably maintain. Corruption is getting out of hand.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Your domain is far greater than your jurisdiction allows you to reasonably maintain. Corruption is getting out of hand.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your awareness of government and administration within your realm is weak, and many have started to question your leadership as a consequence.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Your awareness of government and administration within your realm is weak, and many have started to question your leadership as a consequence.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There is no question with regards to your leadership, but there are aspects of government and administration outside of your awareness.

effect_bundles.localised_description: There is no question with regards to your leadership, but there are aspects of government and administration outside of your awareness.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Nobody is questioning your influence within your administration; nor would anyone want to.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Nobody is questioning your influence within your administration; nor would anyone want to.

localised_description.last_approved_text: If a clerk within your realm releases a govenrment decree, there is a good chance you were involved.

effect_bundles.localised_description: If a clerk within your realm releases a govenrment decree, there is a good chance you were involved.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your influence in the realm is all-encompassing and you are at the centre of every administrative or governmental activity in your realm.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Your influence in the realm is all-encompassing and you are at the centre of every administrative or governmental activity in your realm.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Despite your noble reputation, the accusations against you have stripped you of all authority; it is time to take matters in hand.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Despite your noble reputation, the accusations against you have stripped you of all authority; it is time to take matters in hand.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your jurisdiction may be modest, but your increasing power is a promising sign of things to come.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Your jurisdiction may be modest, but your increasing power is a promising sign of things to come.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Authority does not come easily; you have done well to grow beyond your humble desires and establish yourself as a respectable power.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Authority does not come easily; you have done well to grow beyond your humble desires and establish yourself as a respectable power.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have proven yourself a worthy leader, establishing substantial jurisdiction over the people.

effect_bundles.localised_description: You have proven yourself a worthy leader, establishing substantial jurisdiction over the people.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your reputation precedes you, as words of your great deeds - and great authority! - spread throughout the nobility.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Your reputation precedes you, as words of your great deeds - and great authority! - spread throughout the nobility.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your jurisdiction is far-reaching; the people sing your praises as those who would oppose you fear that they are without claim to the throne.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Your jurisdiction is far-reaching; the people sing your praises as those who would oppose you fear that they are without claim to the throne.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your authority is without question - the one and only rightful successor to the Jin Dynasty!

effect_bundles.localised_description: Your authority is without question; the one and only rightful successor to the Jin Dynasty!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The government has fallen back into the restrictive administration of the Han, and is equally outdated and corrupt.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The government has fallen back into the restrictive administration of the Han, and is equally outdated and corrupt.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Under a conservative administration the government and economy will suffer from inefficiency.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Under a conservative administration the government and economy will suffer from inefficiency.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Progressive reformation has led to a more efficient administration and booming trade.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Progressive reformation has led to a more efficient administration and booming trade.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The increasing decentralisation of the administration has made the government more efficient and traders more prosperous.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The increasing decentralisation of the administration has made the government more efficient and traders more prosperous.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Government and economy are thriving due to a fully modernised administration.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Government and economy are thriving due to a fully modernised administration.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your fury has gone cold but still smoulders with potential.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Your fury has gone cold but still smoulders with potential.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Fueled by ambition and energy, your vigour sparkles.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Fueled by ambition and energy, your vigour sparkles.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Engulfed by the flames of fury, your ambition is burning.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Engulfed by the flames of fury, your ambition is burning.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Like a widespread fire, the flame of your aspirations has swept across the land.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Like a widespread fire, the flame of your aspirations have swept across the land.

localised_description.last_approved_text: From the seeds of wicked inspiration, grand and beautiful acts of deception will grow!

effect_bundles.localised_description: From the seeds of wicked inspiration, grand and beautiful acts of deception will grow!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The stage is set, the pieces set in motion, oblivious to your ambitious schemes.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The stage is set, the pieces set in motion, oblivious to your ambitious schemes.

localised_description.last_approved_text: As one plan falls into place, so another begins to grow around it; sweet and twisted strategems!

effect_bundles.localised_description: As one plan falls into place, so another begins to grow around it; sweet and twisted strategems!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A word in every ear, an ear in every court; none are beyond your scheming reach.

effect_bundles.localised_description: A word in every ear, an ear in every court; none are beyond your scheming reach.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have made the ultimate sacrifice, choosing glory over family.

effect_bundles.localised_description: You have made the ultimate sacrifice, choosing glory over family.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your blood is your bond; power is nothing next to family.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Your blood is your bond; power is nothing next to family.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You believed in yourself, and crushed those who did not. This victory is yours alone.

effect_bundles.localised_description: You believed in yourself, and crushed those who did not. This victory is yours alone.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Virtue and humility have guided you to glory.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Virtue and humility have guided you to glory.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The empress chose poorly, and you have exacted dark, bloody revenge.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The empress chose poorly, and you have exacted dark, bloody revenge.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The emperor above all! You have stayed your hand, and remained loyal to the throne.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The emperor above all! You have stayed your hand, and remained loyal to the throne.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Patience and cunning have rewarded you, after much hard work.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Patience and cunning have rewarded you, after much hard work.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have cut your path to victory, at great and terrible cost.

effect_bundles.localised_description: You have cut your path to victory, at great and terrible cost.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Rage has driven you to ultimate victory. Destruction lies in your wake.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Rage has driven you to ultimate victory. Destruction lies in your wake.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The spirit of generosity has lifted you to victory, carried by a wave of support.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The spirit of generosity has lifted you to victory, carried by a wave of support.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The people have given you your victory; it is to them you owe everything.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The people have given you your victory; it is to them you owe everything.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Wealth has brought you glory, but it is somewhat lonely at the top...

effect_bundles.localised_description: Wealth has brought you glory, but it is somewhat lonely at the top...

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have listened well to your advisors, and their wise counsel has brought you success!

effect_bundles.localised_description: You have listened well to your advisors, and their wise counsel has brought you success!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your will, and yours alone, has driven your countless victories.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Your will, and yours alone, has driven your countless victories.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The ends truly justified the means - the terrible cost was nothing before ultimate victory.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The ends truly justified the means - the terrible cost was nothing before ultimate victory.

localised_description.last_approved_text: True victory is to win without compromising your integrity - this you have done!

effect_bundles.localised_description: True victory is to win without compromising your integrity - this you have done!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your characters are benefiting from experience and teaching.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The empress is severely perturbed by your recent actions.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Murdering the legitimate emperor has temporarily destroyed your reputation - but in the longer term, may prove beneficial.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You retired the former emperor. This saves you the embarrassment of a more... permanent solution, but will leave your legitimacy in permanent question...

effect_bundles.localised_description: You retired the former emperor. This saves you the embarrassment of a more... permanent solution, but will leave your legitimacy in permanent question...

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your recent actions have improved the effectiveness of your spy networks.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Your recent actions have improved the effectiveness of your spy networks.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Those opposed to the empress know you as a friend - but other princes see you as a danger.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Those opposed to the empress know you as a friend - but other princes see you as a danger.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have openly declared against the empress. The righteous rally to your cause, but other princes are cautious of your motives.

effect_bundles.localised_description: You have openly declared against the empress. The righteous rally to your cause, but other princes are cautious of your motives.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You sided with the empress against the other princes.

effect_bundles.localised_description: You sided with the empress against the other princes.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The regent lacks the power of the emperor, but has a veneer of legitimacy.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The regent lacks the power of the emperor, but has a veneer of legitimacy.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your sudden betrayal has appalled all!

effect_bundles.localised_description: Your sudden betrayal has appalled all!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Though many disapprove of your usurpation, most remain silent.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Though many disapprove of your usurpation, most remain silent.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You are recruiting forces from the northern tribes.

effect_bundles.localised_description: You are recruiting forces from the northern tribes.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The former emperor is dead. Without a figurehead for opposing forces, your rule is more stable - once the initial outcry has died down.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The former emperor is dead. Without a figurehead for opposing forces, your rule is more stable - once the initial outcry has died down.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Reform is essential if China is to survive - but sometimes present concerns are more pressing than those of the future.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Reform is essential if China is to survive - but sometimes present concerns are more pressing than those of the future.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Reform is essential if China is to survive - you must push onwards!

effect_bundles.localised_description: Reform is essential if China is to survive - you must push onwards!

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have allowed others to dictate your fate - your grip on power slips...

effect_bundles.localised_description: You have allowed others to dictate your fate - your grip on power slips...

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your will alone holds sway in your domain.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Your will alone holds sway in your domain.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Without a secure foundation, expansion can bring dangerous instability.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Without a secure foundation, expansion can bring dangerous instability.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your authority increase - perhaps now is the time to expand your control.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Your authority increase - perhaps now is the time to expand your control.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Perhaps you have moved too far, too fast - your schemes are at risk.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Perhaps you have moved too far, too fast - your schemes are at risk.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Slowly but surely, your schemes are falling into place.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Slowly but surely, your schemes are falling into place.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Perhaps now is the time for calm and reflection...

effect_bundles.localised_description: Perhaps now is the time for calm and reflection...

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have whipped yourself into a righteous fury!

effect_bundles.localised_description: You have whipped yourself into a righteous fury!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Even you cannot be everywhere at once.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Even you cannot be everywhere at once.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Only with close oversight can the realm develop.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Only with close oversight can the realm develop.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Removes the character from the court and expels her or him from the faction.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Removes the character from the court and expels her or him from the faction.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Duty to the people, for the common good.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Duty to the people, for the common good.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Supervision and security, defence and stability; under military guidance.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Supervision and security, defence and stability; under military guidance.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Holding the capital is a crucial step on the road to rule - but invites the jealousy of other princes.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Holding the capital is a crucial step on the road to rule - but invites the jealousy of other princes.
